title: 70 Matters Related to Fasting
description: Fasting is the 4th of five pillars of islam as known. In this book shiekh Muhammed Salih Almunajjid discusses 70 of the important rules and matters related to this pillar. كتاب سبعون مسألة في الصيام، للشيخ محمد صالح المنجد
author: Muhammad Salih al-Munajjid
